english: It is a human weakness to put things off .
chinese: 把事情拖延下去是人的弱点。

english: The situation does not permit of any delay .
chinese: 情势不容许任何的拖延。

english: She keeps putting off going to the dentist .
chinese: 她老是拖延着不去看牙病。

english: Delay is the deadliest form of denial .
chinese: 拖延是最厉害的拒绝形式。

english: The news determined her against further delay .
chinese: 这消息使她下决心不再拖延。
拖延造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: She wrote to enquire the cause of the delay .
chinese: 她只得写信去询问拖延的理由。
饥饿和口渴的问题可以拖延一下。

english: Even this extra minute was a reprieve .
chinese: 就这样多拖延一分钟也好象是一种缓刑。

english: I object to letting the matter stand over any longer .
chinese: 我反对再把这事拖延下去。

english: Clear evidence of his intent is to prolong the ritual .
chinese: 显然他意在拖延典礼时间。

english: Nevertheless, the organizing task has not waited .
chinese: 然而，组织方面的任务不能拖延。

english: It is a nuisance , this delay .
He is determined to delay no more .
Not a moment was lost in delay of any kind .
chinese: 没有一分钟的损失，没有任何形式的拖延。
